attrs.title: Cross origin resource sharing
attrs.description: How to share cross origin resource?

body:
How to share cross-origin resource?

The solution of cross origin resource sharing in Nuxt.js 

npm i @nuxtjs/proxy -D

In nuxt.config.js 

 modules: [
      '@nuxtjs/axios',
      '@nuxtjs/proxy'
  ],
proxy: {
  '/api': {
    target: 'http://example.com',
    pathRewrite: {
      '^/api' : '/'
      }
    }
}
